title: Replying in a post
body: So it says I need to be level 6 to be able to post and I am ingame level 21 why can't it detect my level ? any help ?

replies.body: Making a post or voting will update your level on the boards. You should be able to post normally now, and if not, give it an hour.

Your account needs to sync with the boards to get your updated level and information.  This commonly happens if you are posting for the first time, and it looks like your post here has updated your profile!  Let us know if you have anymore issues posting!
